# Multi-Agent Framework (MAF)

> Production-ready framework for autonomous multi-agent software development
> Version 1.0.0 | Boomerang Apps

## Quick Context

- 29 agents (CTO, PM, 10 FE Dev, 10 BE Dev, 5 QA, DevOps, Security)
- 12 domains (auth, client, pilot, project, proposal, payment, deliverables, messaging, admin, core, layout, notifications)
- 8 gates (0-7)
- 108 forbidden operations

## Core Documents (Start Here)

- [core/SAFETY-PROTOCOL.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/core/SAFETY-PROTOCOL.md): 108 forbidden operations, emergency levels
- [core/DOMAINS.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/core/DOMAINS.md): Domain boundaries and file ownership
- [core/AGENTS.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/core/AGENTS.md): 29 agent definitions with roles and models
- [core/PM-VALIDATOR-SECTIONS.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/core/PM-VALIDATOR-SECTIONS.md): 30 validation checks

## Architecture

- [reference/architecture/migrations/maf-complete-migration.sql](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/reference/architecture/migrations/maf-complete-migration.sql): Database schema (9 tables)
- [reference/architecture/lib/signal-helpers.ts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/reference/architecture/lib/signal-helpers.ts): 18 TypeScript signal functions
- [reference/architecture/schemas/ai-story-schema-v4.json](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/reference/architecture/schemas/ai-story-schema-v4.json): AI Story schema

## Operations

- [reference/operations/maf-worktree.sh](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/reference/operations/maf-worktree.sh): Git worktree automation
- [reference/operations/MAF-INTEGRATION-GUIDE.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Boomerang-Apps/maf-d7x9k2m4p8/main/reference/operations/MAF-INTEGRATION-GUIDE.md): Integration guide

## Key Rules

1. CTO is the ONLY agent who can merge to main
2. QA agents are independent - devs cannot self-approve
3. 108 forbidden operations must be enforced
4. Git worktrees isolate agent work
5. Database signals coordinate agents
